alert.note: Alert for Addison; Caledonia; Chittenden; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 10 at 5:26AM EDT until July 10 at 8:30AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 AM EDT THIS MORNING FOR CENTRAL ADDISON, NORTHWESTERN ORANGE, WASHINGTON, SOUTHWESTERN CALEDONIA, SOUTHWESTERN ORLEANS, SOUTHEASTERN CHITTENDEN, LAMOILLE AND NORTHERN WINDSOR COUNTIES... At 526 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Barre, Montpelier, Middlebury, Morrisville, Moretown, Berlin, Middlesex, E F Knapp State Airport, Northfield Village, Northfield, Waterbury Village, East Montpelier, Barre City, Waterbury, Waitsfield, Worcester, Duxbury, Barre Town, Williamstown and Roxbury. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Addison; Caledonia; Chittenden; Lamoille; Orange; Orleans; Washington; Windsor
